meanings.definition: More good or better in quality or character.
meanings.sent1: The new book was goodlier than the old one.
meanings.sent2: She believed that kindness made her a goodlier person.
meanings.sent3: The goodlier cupcakes were gone in seconds at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as goodlier as a ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The goodlier painting captured the beauty of the countryside perfectly.

meanings.definition: In a more excellent way or manner.
meanings.sent1: She sang goodlier than anyone else in the choir.
meanings.sent2: He ran goodlier than he ever had before in the race.
meanings.sent3: The magician waved his wand goodlier than a fairy godmother.
meanings.sent4: The stars shone goodlier in the clear night sky.
meanings.sent5: The flowers bloomed goodlier after the rain shower.
